title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\SerializedTaxonomy
name: SerializedTaxonomy
description:
A nested protocol buffer that represents a taxonomy and the hierarchy of its policy tags. Used for taxonomy replacement, import, and export.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.SerializedTaxonomy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Required. Display name of the taxonomy. At most 200 bytes when encoded in UTF-8.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Description of the serialized taxonomy. At most 2000 bytes when encoded in UTF-8. If not set, defaults to an empty description.

params.name: data.policy_tags
params.description: Top level policy tags associated with the taxonomy, if any.

params.name: data.activated_policy_types
params.description: A list of policy types that are activated per taxonomy.
